result.title: What's the status of e-maxx translation project?
result.content:
Here RodionGork started a project to translate http://e-maxx.ru/ into English. Looking at the project now, it looks barely alive â€” the last commit is almost 6 months old. So I'm curious whether it is still maintained and whether new contributions are welcome.

The reason of my sudden interest is the approaching Hacktoberfest which encourages people to contribute to open source by giving away T-shirts for contributions. This looks like just the thing we need to revitalize the translation :-)
